cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: How we use cookies to improve your experience
cookies.intro: This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them on our site and your options regarding them. By using FitCoach, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device by websites you visit. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to site owners.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for core functionality like login and security. Cannot be disabled.

performance.title: Performance and Analytics Cookies
performance.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site, collecting information anonymously.

yourOptions.title: Your Options
yourOptions.description: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie preferences by managing them in your browser settings. Note that if you choose to reject cookies, you may still use our website, although your access to some functionality and areas may be restricted.
yourOptions.privacy: For more details on how we manage your data, see our

pricing.title: Plans That Adapt to Your Goal
pricing.subtitle: Choose the ideal plan for your fitness journey. All plans include 30-day guarantee.

q1.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your plan anytime without additional fees. Your access remains active until the end of the paid period.

q2.question: Is there a free trial period?
q2.answer: We offer 7 days free for all plans. No credit card required to start.

q3.question: Can I change plans later?
q3.answer: Sure! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. We adjust the amount proportionally.

q4.question: Do workouts work offline?
q4.answer: Yes, you can download workouts and use offline. Synchronization happens when you connect again.

q5.question: Is there a satisfaction guarantee?
q5.answer: We offer a 30-day guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we return 100% of your money.

q6.question: How does medical support work?
q6.answer: Our Premium and Enterprise plans include monitoring with certified health professionals.

cta.title: Still have questions about which plan to choose?
cta.subtitle: Our team is ready to help you find the perfect plan

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about FitCoach

1.question: How do I start using FitCoach?
1.answer: Download the app, create your account with basic information like age, weight, height and goals. Our AI will create a personalized plan in seconds. You can start with our 7-day free trial.

2.question: How does AI personalize my workouts?
2.answer: Our AI analyzes your biometric data, workout history, preferences, physical limitations and progress in real time. Each session is adapted based on your performance and feedback.

3.question: Do I need equipment to train?
3.answer: Not necessarily! We offer workouts with and without equipment. You can choose bodyweight-only workouts or add equipment that you have available. AI adapts exercises according to your resources.

5.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
5.answer: You can cancel anytime in your account settings. Access continues until the end of the paid period. We don't charge cancellation fees and the process is 100% online.

12.question: Is there a guarantee period?
12.answer: Yes! We offer 7 days free to test all features. If you're not satisfied, cancel before the trial period and you won't be charged.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: Our support team is here to help you.

ricardo.name: Ricardo Pironato
ricardo.bio: Former VP of Engineering at iFood and specialist in high-scale systems. Computer Science degree from USP with MBA from Stanford.

ana.name: Ana Costa
ana.bio: PhD in AI from MIT and former Machine Learning lead at Google. Expert in personalization algorithms and distributed systems.

carlos.name: Carlos Silva
carlos.bio: Former product director at Spotify and user experience specialist. Design degree from ESDI with UX specialization from IDEO.

mariana.name: Mariana Santos
mariana.bio: Former marketing director at Nike Brazil and sports marketing specialist. MBA from Wharton and Growth certification from Reforge.

pedro.name: Pedro Oliveira
pedro.bio: Former VP of Finance at Nubank and fintech specialist. Economics degree from FGV with MBA from Wharton and CFA charter.
achievements: 10+ years in fintech and venture capital

juliana.name: Juliana Lima
juliana.bio: PhD in Statistics from Stanford and former chief scientist at Uber. Expert in recommendation algorithms and predictive analytics.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.subtitle: Our commitment to making FitCoach accessible to everyone.
accessibility.intro: FitCoach is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying relevant accessibility standards.

measures.title: Support Measures
measures.description: We take the following measures to ensure accessibility:

items.mission: We include accessibility as part of our mission.
items.development: We integrate accessibility into our development practices.

visual.title: Visual
visual.description: Color contrast, resizable text and screen reader compatibility.

auditory.title: Auditory
auditory.description: Video captions and visual alternatives for audio content.

motor.title: Motor
motor.description: Keyboard navigation and adjustable response times.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We appreciate your feedback on FitCoach accessibility. Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers:
feedback.response: We seek to respond to feedback within 5 business days.

mariana.name: Mariana Santos
mariana.text: In 6 months, I lost 33lbs and gained a quality of life I didn't imagine was possible. FitCoach's AI understands exactly what I need.

carlos.name: Carlos Eduardo
carlos.text: As someone who spends all day at the computer, I found workouts that fit my routine. I've never felt so strong and energetic.

ana.name: Ana Paula
ana.text: The scientific precision of the workouts impresses me. As a doctor, I can attest: it's the future of personalized fitness.
